alert.note: Alert for City of Alexandria (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 14 at 4:56PM EDT until August 14 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA... SOUTHERN MONTGOMERY...WEST CENTRAL PRINCE GEORGES...ARLINGTON...AND EAST CENTRAL FAIRFAX COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF ALEXANDRIA WILL EXPIRE AT 500 PM EDT... The storm which prompted the warning has moved out of the area. Therefore, the warning will be allowed to expire. However gusty winds and heavy rain are still possible with this thunderstorm. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Sterling Virginia. Remember, a Severe Thunderstorm Warning still remains in effect for portions of Montgomery and Prince Georges County and the District of Columbia.
